TopicTitle: A quick question about the curse client.

Articles.Content:
I had another urge to play ksp the other week so decided to do a fresh install and grab some of my old mods. These are mods I've had working before but for the life of me couldnt get working again.

I was just wondering if we know when the curse client will support ksp? (i've seen it said that it will be the next curse update) Is this something squad has to work with curse to achieve. Ive really held back on mods due to the above problem and have been waiting for something like curse to come along for a while now. I just want to know when the client will support ksp...im dying, playing this vanilla crap...and im too lazy to get all my mods working the old fashion way!

Thanks
Well, your guess is as good as ours when it comes to this. I've also heard that the next version of the Curse client will support KSP, but I don't know when it's due.

One of the Curse people in the Curse thread said it was planned for "this year", but that could be months away.

I'd recommend that you try a few manually downloaded mods, most of them support 23.5 pretty well by now.
Ok thanks I wasnt sure if there had been an announcement. I will continue to add mods the sucker way
Hmm... I wonder what will come first, 0.24 or Curse client support.
